mapper.select: select * from posts p, users u where p.user_id = u.user_id and magazine_num = magazine_num order by magazine_num desc limit #{start},#{size}
select count(*) from posts p, users u where p.user_id = u.user_id and category=7 order by magazine_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into posts(image, contents, category, title, nickname, uid , user_id, magazine_num) values(#{image}, #{contents}, #{category}, #{title}, #{nickname}, #{uid}, #{user_id}, #{magazine_num});
mapper.update: update posts set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where magazine_num =#{magazine_num} and category=7
